retake.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to get control of an area again in a war
retake.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: an attempt to retake the city
retake.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to take an examination again because you have previously failed it
retake.translation[1].definitions[0].def: an act of filming or photographing something again
retake.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: They had to do several retakes before the director was satisfied.
retake.translation[1].definitions[1].def: an examination or test that you take again because you failed it
